name: reuimrmo
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wreu(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w0)))

stmt.origin: syl5(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wreu(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))

comment: Restricted uniqueness implies restricted "at most one" through implication, analogous to ~ euimmo . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jun-2017.)
